commands.name: az managed-cassandra cluster backup list
commands.summary: List the backups of this cluster that are available to restore.
examples: az managed-cassandra cluster backup list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --cluster-name MyCluster

commands.name: az managed-cassandra cluster backup show
commands.summary: Get a managed cassandra backup resource of this cluster.
examples: az managed-cassandra cluster backup show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --cluster-name MyCluster --backup-id BackUpId
